# 7.43.0

## release on 20250417
## description
## changes
<strong><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="warning">
⚠️</g-emoji> This version supports React Native versions up to RN73. If you are looking for RN76 support + new architecture -- upgrade to version <code>8.x.x</code></strong>

Fixes

* Reverted the accidentally released version 7.42.0 which dropped support for RN 73.

Features

Android

Introducing color animations for top-bar and status-bar (<a href="https://github.com/wix/react-native-navigation/pull/7969" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/wix/react-native-navigation/pull/7969/hovercard">#7969</a> by <a href="https://github.com/d4vidi">d4vidi</a>)
